column2: so I'm just going to point out a few favorites. From the happy hour
column3: we ordered the machi cure and buta abura kasu. Both were excellent and unique. I especially enjoyed the pork in the kasu. From the permanent menu
column6: and the chef's five pieces of sushi. The beef with the hot rock was wonderful and tender
column7: and it was fun to get to cook the beef on the rock. Both tempura pieces were wonderful
column8: but my favorite had to be the pumpkin. The five pieces of sushi were one of my favorite parts of the meal. Each sushi piece was lightly garnished
column9: but it really made each piece stand out.
